comments.body:
[optional] FYI with this syntax if you prefer to avoid the repeated words you could use `(FlutterDriver)` instead of `(FlutterDriver driver)`. That second "driver" adds no new information. Same with `FlutterProject project`, `FlutterPluginProject pluginProject`. Similarly you could drop the non-information-carrying single letter argument name and use `(Dessert)` over `(Dessert d)`.

The argument names are mandatory with the old syntax, but optional with the function type syntax.

Some of the names are carrying information, like `srcFile` and `destFile`, so those should definitely be retained.
